sspb.pages.sspb_page.name: SSPB
sspb.options.shadowyness.name: Shadowyness
sspb.options.shadowyness.tooltip:
Adjusts the strength of the vanilla-like shadows on non-full blocks

0% - None (Sodium Default)
85% - Default
100% - Max
sspb.options.onlyaffectpathblocks.name: Only affect path blocks
sspb.options.onlyaffectpathblocks.toolti:
The bug in vanilla Minecraft that causes shadowy path blocks actually affects all non-fluid non-full blocks

By default, SSPB applies the vanilla-like smooth lighting to all non-fluid non-full blocks as well. Enabling this will limit the effects to path blocks only.
